long_description: Sleek and sophisticated with a slim silhouette, the merino wool Icebreaker Transit Jacket is made for urban adventures-and for taking any city by storm. 260-weight merino wool fabric has a luxurious fleecelike feel and offers you a natural alternative to synthetic fleece; fabric has a touch of spandex for comfortable stretch. Soft, nonirritating merino wool wicks away moisture and resists odors-naturally. UPF 50+ sun protection. Secure zippered hand pockets. Icebreaker Transit Jacket is machine-washable; hang to dry.
short_description: Sleek and sophisticated with a slim silhouette, the merino wool Icebreaker Transit Jacket is made for urban adventures-and for taking any city by storm.
